structure.unit: OFFENSES AGAINST PUBLIC HEALTH AND SAFETY

law.text: It is the intent of the Legislature that KRS 438.305 to 438.340 shall be enforced in an equitable and uniform manner throughout the Commonwealth. For the purpose of equitable and uniform enforcement, the provisions of KRS 438.305 to 438.340 shall supersede any subsequently enacted local law, ordinance, or regulation which relates to the use, display, sale, or distribution of tobacco products. It is the intent of the Legislature that KRS 438.305 to 438.340 be enforced so as to ensure the eligibility for and receipt of any federal funds or grants that the Commonwealth of Kentucky now receives or may receive relating to the provisions of KRS 438.305 to 438.340.
law.history: Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 38, sec. 1, effective March 5, 1996. -- Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 480, sec. 11, effective July 15, 1994.
